\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 70019}

\subsection*{Tastes Like Burning}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Hempeater}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 5.0 g & oral & Voacanga africana & tea\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 130.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Made tea from 5 grams of voacanga africana root. I let it steep for an hour. Smells like ginseng, tastes fiery, awful. 



1:00 - Finished drinking the tea.



2:30 - Mild stimulant effect, similar to caffeine. Not much else as far as I can tell.



5:00 - Still feel the effect. It's not a bad caffeine substitute if not for the flavour.

\end{document}
